availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert A. Mading (Robertson co., TN + Caldwell Co. KY farmer)

body.p: Robertson County, Tennessee, and Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary J. McKent Mading. Father of David A. Mading, Joseph L. Mading, John T. Mading, Andrew Mading, O. Mading, W. Mading, A. Mading, and Robert A. Madding. Farmer in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Robertson County, Tennessee, in 1860. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1861. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 2, p. 288A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Robertson County, Western Division, p. 487-88.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 13.
